poem:
Title: "Embryonic Controversy Frozen in Time"

In the heartland's frozen morn,
Tiny potential beings, unborn.
Infinished masterpieces framed by law,
Discord's rough, and gnawing jaw.
Cautious of how life's defined,
In the labyrinth of the mind.
A thread of chaos unwinds,
Where the certainty of science grinds,
Against beliefs tradition binds,
In Alabama's springtime blinds.
